price: 46. Kaadu Yallâ fanah kay idnih sinam seecak koo rubneeh, atu nabiyow tirri iyyam faxa marah ura faanusih inna kinnito.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
